elements.name: panel2
elements.title: The chart below shows the main occupational groups in which Swiss and foreign nationals were employed in 2000 and 2020. Search the chart specifically for the information listed.

elements.html: <iframe src="https://e.infogram.com/4576f3b4-2e3a-4500-bd18-dacbd1fd5ac6?src=embed" title="T8 M2 A7: Berufshauptgruppen" width="550" height="753" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" style="border:none;" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
elements.name: question1
question2
elements.title: In 2020, foreign nationals mainly worked in these four occupational groups:
elements.correctAnswer: Intellectual and scientific occupations, technicians and equivalent non-technical occupations, service occupations and salespersons, craft and related occupations.
